00061 #define SEER_DEFINES \
00062         "       #define LIST_COUNT(x)  __util_list_count ( (t_list *)x )\n"\
00063         "       #define LIST_END(x)    __util_list_get_last ( (t_list *)x )\n"\
00064         "       #define LIST_FFWD(x)   while(x&&x->next) x=x->next\n"\
00065         "       #define LIST_REWND(x)  while(x&&x->prev) x=x->prev\n"\
00066         "       #define LIST_ADD(x,y)  __util_list_add ( (t_list *)x, (t_list *)y  )\n"\
00067         "       #define LIST_NEW(x,y)  (y*)__util_list_add_new (  (t_list *)x, sizeof(y), #y )\n"\
00068         "       #define LIST_PREV(x)   x=x->prev\n"\
00069         "       #define LIST_NEXT(x)   x=x->next\n"\
00070         "       #define LIST_FREE(x)   __util_list_free ( (t_list *)x ); x = NULL\n"\
00071         "       #define LIST_MALLOC(x) (x*)__util_smalloc ( sizeof(x), #x )\n"\
00072         "   #define FLAGS_ENDIANESS    0x00030000\n"\
00073         "   #define FLAGS_ENDIANESS_LE 0x00010000\n"\
00074         "   #define FLAGS_ENDIANESS_BE 0x00020000\n"\
00075         "   #define FLAGS_FREE_NAME    0x00040000\n"\
00076         "   #define FLAGS_REPLACE      0x00080000\n"\

00080 #define ABS(x) (((x) < 0) ? -(x) : (x))

00082 #define LIST_COUNT(x)  util_list_count ( (t_list *)x )
00083 #define LIST_END(x)    util_list_get_last ( (t_list *)x )
00084 #define LIST_FFWD(x)   while(x&&x->next) x=x->next
00085 #define LIST_REWND(x)  while(x&&x->prev) x=x->prev
00086 #define LIST_ADD(x,y)  util_list_add ( (t_list *)x, (t_list *)y  )
00087 #define LIST_NEW(x,y)  (y*)util_list_add_new (  (t_list *)x, sizeof(y), #y )
00088 #define LIST_PREV(x)   x=x->prev
00089 #define LIST_NEXT(x)   x=x->next
00090 #define LIST_FREE(x)   util_list_free ( (t_list *)x ); x = NULL
00091 #define LIST_MALLOC(x) (x*)util_smalloc ( sizeof(x), #x )

00094 #define CHECK_AND_FREE(x) if ( x ) free ( x );

00120 /*
00121                  JUST FOR TESTING
00122                         ------------------
00123     to be replaced with functions that respect the
00124     other segments and its start addresses
00125 */
00126 #define GET_WORD(x,y) ((GET_HALF(x,(y))<<16)|GET_HALF(x,(y+2)))
00127 #define GET_TRIP(x,y) ((GET_BYTE(x,(y))<<16)|GET_HALF(x,(y+1)))
00128 #define GET_HALF(x,y) ((GET_BYTE(x,(y))<<8)|GET_BYTE(x,(y+1)))
00129 #define GET_BYTE(x,y) (x->segments->data[y])
00130 #define GET_PTR(x,y) &(x->segments->data[y])
00131 #define GET_SIZE(x)   (x->segments->length)
